input:
Alice, Bob, and Claire are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a green ball, Bob has a blue ball, and Claire has a brown ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Claire and Bob swap balls. Then, Alice and Claire swap balls. Finally, Alice and Bob swap balls. At the end of the game, Bob has the
Options:
(A) green ball
(B) blue ball
(C) brown ball
